abstract: Omnicom, the second largest Madison Avenue holding company, hopes that acquiring Nancy Bailey & Associates will strengthen its brand and corporate licensing stable.
snippet: Omnicom, the second largest Madison Avenue holding company, hopes that acquiring Nancy Bailey & Associates will strengthen its brand and corporate licensing stable.
lead_paragraph: THE Omnicom Group is adding to its holdings in the field of brand and corporate licensing by acquiring a leading company that makes licensing deals for marketers like Procter & Gamble.

headline.main: Omnicom Adds to Its Repertoire in Brand Licensing
headline.print_headline: Omnicom Adds to Its Repertoire in Brand Licensing
